subContent.title: Owner
list: Owner income generated from top-line revenue.
Only requires owner to analyse occupancy and ADR.

subContent.title: Manager
list: Manager is structurally incentivised to maximize cost efficiency.

subContent.title: Owner
list: Operating costs are absorbed by profit sharing pool
Requires owner to analyse all expenses.

subContent.title: Manager
list: Manager benefits from same profit sharing pool as owner
